answerText: Dirac equation[10] The Dirac equation only applies to these particles. Electrons are one example of these particles, which have half-integer spin.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 19 | 6 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This equation includes two four-by-four Hermitian, anti-commuting matrices symbolized alpha and beta. For 10 points each: [10] Name this equation which extends the Schrodinger equation to relativistic motion. It led to the prediction of antimatter.
